Text: As much as I loathe Alex Perry (the supposed 'mentor'), I love this show.. thanks so much for so reliably uploading it, rkstr!

I love Alex Perry and rkstr. ty
Alex Perry is a 'gay douchebag' :3 This ain't no slur, there's plenty of types of douchebags out there. Anyway, thanks for uploading these

I don't think its necessary to start throwing slurs around @peachpuppy - the show wouldn't probably exist without the gays and its a gay that uploads it for everyone.Better check your audience before leaving comments like that
